derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (as a trademark): from gran- (representing granular or grain) + -ola (suffix chiefly in US usage). The current term dates from the 1970s

means.word_mean: 1. cereal made of especially rolled oats with dried fruits and nuts and honey or brown sugar
